Detailed Description

The LogEntry class represents log entries.

An instance of LogEntry can be added to a Log. Each LogEntry can be classified into the log classes ERROR_LOG, WARNING_LOG, EVENT_LOG, INFO_LOG, and DEBUG_LOG with up to 16 severity levels. A log entry consists of a descriptor string and optional several string or numeric values.

See also:
Log
Author:
Frank Fock

Marty Janzen

Version:
3.5f

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

LogEntry::LogEntry (  unsigned char  t  )  [inline]
 

Constructor with log class and severity level.

Parameters:
t - The type of the log entry. The type is composed by a logical OR of the log entry class with a level of 0 up to 15.
Note:
A error log of level 0 will stop program execution!
